topic.title: Exercise: quer019 - Customers with orders the week before Christmas

body.section: Create a list of customers who ordered the last week before Christmas 2010 (12/20/2010 until 12/24/2010). Show code, name, and address of these customers. Each customer may occur only one time in the overview. Name the query quer019.The same customer may exist on the list more than one time. To avoid this, the value of the query property Unique Values should be Yes.
